title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 

of State at the Department of Justice) (No. 2) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department justice) (no 2) order 2024

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 2. Matthew Fenlon, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Matthew Fenlon, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Justice, is appointed as Special Adviser to the 
Minister of State at the Department of Justice, with effect from 10 April 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
of the Government, 
16 July, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 19th July, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [360] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
